input.sentences: me and th wife went out for a day around town .
we stopped by the bay for some pictures .
it was so nice that we decided to stay a while .
we ended up spending the whole day there .
we ended the day by the lighthouse . it was perfect .
output.sentences: A husband took his wife to town for the day.
They stopped to take pictures by the bay.
They decided to stay because of the nice weather.
They wound up spending the whole day there.
They had a perfect day at the lighthouse.
